text: Approval for an extendable/retractable screw-in pacing lead.  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade names medtronic capsure(r) fix novus model 5076 and vitatron crystalline(r) actfix model icf09 pacing leads.  These devices are indicated for permanent pacing and sensing of the ventricle and/or atrium when used with a compatible pule generator.
